meanings.def: a trip that you go on for pleasure or education, usually with a group of people and lasting no more than one day
examples: on an outing (to…) We went on an outing to London.
outing to… Every year she organized an outing to the countryside.
a long and difficult journey across the mountains
the first expedition to the South Pole
We went on an all-day excursion to the island.
The children were on a day’s outing from school.
We had a day out at the beach.
We're going on an outing tomorrow.
The children were on a day's outing from school.

meanings.def: an occasion when somebody takes part in a competition
the practice of naming people as gay or lesbian in public, when they would prefer to keep this information private
